title: Zookeeping
description: This book is an interview with Jeff Polcen, lead zookeeper of hoofed mammals at the Cleveland Metroparks Zoo. Readers learn about the animals under Jeff's care and the responsibilities of a lead zookeeper. Zookeeping contains many fascinating facts about the care of giraffes, zebras, ostriches, and gazelles.
highFrequencyWords: anesthesia, antelope, exhibits, giraffes, hoofed, procedure, species, vultures, zookeeper
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
